SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

be.docarch.odt2braille
Class OdtTransformer

java.lang.Object
  be.docarch.odt2braille.OdtTransformer

public class OdtTransformer
extends java.lang.Object

This class enables you to transform a flat .odt file to a DAISY-like xml file that is suited to be processed by liblouisxml. Note that, although it looks like a DAISY xml file, it is not, and would not validate. The actual transformation is done with XSLT. In addition to XSLT, OdtTransformer also has a supporting preProcessing(be.docarch.odt2braille.Settings) method. Thanks to this preprocessing the XSL transform is considerably simplified. On the other hand, preProcessing is rather slow because it uses DOM (performance should be improved in the future).

Author:
Bert Frees
See Also:
DAISY xml specification

OdtTransformer

public OdtTransformer(java.io.File odtFile,
                      StatusIndicator statusIndicator,
                      java.util.Locale oooLocale)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                      javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Creates a new OdtTransformer instance.

Parameters:
flatOdtFile - The "flat XML" .odt file. This single file is the concatenation of all XML files in a normal .odt file.
statusIndicator - The StatusIndicator that will be used.
odtLocale - The Locale for the document.
oooLocale - The Locale for the user interface.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

preProcessing

public void preProcessing(Settings settings)
                   throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                          org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                          javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
  • page numbers,
  • list numbers, and
  • heading numbers
are added to the .odt file and some correction processing is done (see OdtUtils.correctionProcessing(java.lang.String)).

Throws:
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
org.xml.sax.SAXException
java.io.IOException
javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

insertPagination

private java.lang.Object[] insertPagination(Settings settings,
                                            org.w3c.dom.Node root,
                                            org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                            int pagenum,
                                            java.lang.String masterPageName,
                                            boolean isFirst)
                                     throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Insert a special pagenum tag at the beginning of each page. This method is called recursively so that each document node is eventually processed once.

Parameters:
root - The root element of the .odt document.
node - The next node to be processed. On the first call, this parameter should be set to the first element of the document body. This first node plus all following siblings and their descendants will then be processed eventually.
pagenum - The number of the current page (should be set to zero on the first call).
masterPageName - The master-page name of the current page (should be set to "Standard" on the first call).
isFirst - Should be set to true on the first call.
Returns:
The updated [pagenum, masterPageName]. Most of the code was copied from com.versusoft.packages.jodl.OdtUtils (Vincent Spiewak), but several improvements were made.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

insertHeadingNumbering

private void insertHeadingNumbering(org.w3c.dom.Node root,
                                    org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                    boolean init)
                             throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Insert a special num tag before each numbered or bulleted heading. This method is called recursively so that each heading element is eventually processed once.

Parameters:
root - The root element of the .odt document.
node - The next node to be processed. On the first call, this parameter is irrelevant.
init - Should be set to true on the first call.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

insertListNumbering

private void insertListNumbering(org.w3c.dom.Node root,
                                 org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                 int level,
                                 boolean init)
                          throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Insert a special num tag before each numbered or bulleted listitem. This method is called recursively so that each list is eventually processed once.

Parameters:
root - The root element of the .odt document.
node - The next node to be processed. On the first call, this parameter is irrelevant.
level - The level of the next node, being the number of ancestors of type list. On the first call, this parameter is irrelevant.
init - Should be set to true on the first call.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
